00039 struct PropertyEnumItem {
00040     PropertyEnumItem(uint value, string name, string description) :
00041         name(name), description(description), value(value) { }
00042 
00043     string name;
00044     string description;
00045     uint value;
00046 };
00047 
00048 // FIXME deprecated
00049 enum PropertyOptions {
00050     NORMAL = 0x00,
00051     READ_ONLY = 0x01,
00052     DONT_SAVE = 0x02,
00053     INFO = READ_ONLY | DONT_SAVE,
00054     NOT_PERSISTENT = DONT_SAVE      // deprecated
00055 };
00056 
00057 enum PropertyOptionsEnum {
00058     // persistence options (first two bits)
00059     PERSISTENT = 0x00,  // the property will be loaded from the file and then saved to it (default)
00060     VOLATILE = 0x01,    // the property will NEVER be loaded, and will be saved NULL
00061     KEEP_THIS = 0x02,   // the property will be loaded, but NEVER overwritten
00062     // rconsole options (third bit)
00063     EDITABLE = 0x00,    // rconsole operator can edit this property (default)
00064     NOT_EDITABLE = 0x04 // rconsole operator can only see this property
00065 };
00066 
00067 class PropertyDef { // FIXME da seguire QUESTA strada
00068 protected:
00069     std::string objectClassName;
00070     std::string description;
00071     
00072     Url linkTo;
00073     
00074     int persistenceOptions;
00075     bool rconsoleEditable;
00076     string externalFileName;
00077     bool externalFileBinary;
00078     
00079 public:
00080     PropertyDef(int poe = (PERSISTENT | EDITABLE)) : 
00081         linkTo(""), persistenceOptions(PERSISTENT), rconsoleEditable(true),
00082         externalFileName(""), externalFileBinary(false)
00083     { 
00084         if (poe & (KEEP_THIS | VOLATILE)) {
00085             persistenceOptions |= KEEP_THIS;    // defensive programming
00086             throw InvalidOperation("May a thunder catch you, you cannot set a property "
00087                 "to be both KEEP_THIS and VOLATILE! (" + description + ")");
00088         }
00089         else {
00090             if (poe & VOLATILE) persistenceOptions |= VOLATILE;
00091             if (poe & KEEP_THIS) persistenceOptions |= KEEP_THIS;
00092         }
00093         if (poe & NOT_EDITABLE) rconsoleEditable = false;
00094     }
00095     
00096     // link
00097     inline Url getLinkTo() const { return linkTo; }
00098     inline bool isLink() const { return linkTo != ""; }
00099     inline void setLinkTo(CUrl url) { linkTo = url; }
00100     
00101     // description and class name
00102     inline string getDescription() const { return description; }
00103     inline void setDescription(cstr s) { description = s; }
00104     string getObjectClassName() const;
00105     void setObjectClassName(cstr s) throw (InvalidOperation);
00106     
00107     // persistence
00108     inline bool isPersistent() const { return (persistenceOptions & (VOLATILE | KEEP_THIS)) == 0; }
00109     inline bool isVolatile() const { return persistenceOptions & VOLATILE; }
00110     inline bool isKeepThis() const { return persistenceOptions & KEEP_THIS; }
00111     inline void setPersistent() { persistenceOptions = persistenceOptions & ~(VOLATILE | KEEP_THIS); }
00112     inline void setVolatile() { persistenceOptions = (persistenceOptions & ~KEEP_THIS) | VOLATILE; }
00113     inline void setKeepThis() { persistenceOptions = (persistenceOptions & ~VOLATILE) | KEEP_THIS; }
00114     
00115     // persistence / external file name
00116     inline string getExternalFileName() const { return externalFileName; }
00117     inline void setExternalFileName(cstr fileName) { externalFileName = fileName; }
00118     inline bool isExternalSaved() const { return externalFileName != ""; }
00119     inline bool isExternalFileBinary() const { return externalFileBinary; }
00120     inline bool isExternalFileXml() const { return !externalFileBinary; }
00121     inline void setExternalFileBinary() { externalFileBinary = true; }
00122     inline void setExternalFileXml() { externalFileBinary = false; }
00123     
00124     // rconsole options
00125     inline bool isEditable() const { return rconsoleEditable; }
00126     inline bool isNotEditable() const { return !rconsoleEditable; }
00127     inline void setEditable() { rconsoleEditable = true; }
00128     inline void setNotEditable() { rconsoleEditable = false; }
00129     
00130     // static members
00131     static bool isClassPersistent(cstr objectClassName);
00132     static bool isClassVolatile(cstr objectClassName);
00133     static bool isClassKeepThis(cstr objectClassName);
00134 };

00194     virtual ~Property();
